about_the_game:
Road To Place Is a dice rolling roguelike. That you move based on the number you roll with the dice. Dice rolling can also determine outcomes bad or good, whether you defeat the raiders or get hurt in the process. There are 4 resources bullets, medicine, food, and money. Run out of food you will get hurt or starve. Run out of bullets you will have a tough time to defend against the raiders. Run out of medicine and you won't be able to heal your player. If you run out of a resource, you can either search the woods to find it, fight raiders to get resources, or simply buy it using money at the shops.(money is acquired the same way as the other resources). Perks will help you along the way to acquire perks you need to find mushrooms along the way, and you guessed it, roll for the perk. If you manage to get to "the place" There are 3 different endings, luckily you can have up to 3 adventurers to help get you there.
Features-
-Multiple Items
-a shop where you can buy and sell resources
-multiple endings
-recruit other travelers along the way
-dice rolls
-find resources in the forest
-gain perks to help you along the way
-3 difficulties
